:::

#### SG Government Engities Data set (EN)
This R script processes a dataset (EN) containing government agency names, where abbreviations are enclosed in parentheses ( ). The goal is to extract these abbreviations into a new column (ABBREVIATION) while keeping a clean version of the agency names (NAME_CLEAN).





::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 6 × 5
  NAME                                   CATEGORY SUBCAT ABBREVIATION NAME_CLEAN
  <chr>                                  <chr>    <chr>  <chr>        <chr>     
1 MINISTRY OF CULTURE, COMMUNITY AND YO… MINISTRY <NA>   MCCY         MINISTRY …
2 MINISTRY OF DEFENCE (MINDEF)           MINISTRY <NA>   MINDEF       MINISTRY …
3 MINISTRY OF DIGITAL DEVELOPMENT AND I… MINISTRY <NA>   MDDI         MINISTRY …
4 MINISTRY OF EDUCATION (MOE)            MINISTRY <NA>   MOE          MINISTRY …
5 MINISTRY OF FINANCE (MOF)              MINISTRY <NA>   MOF          MINISTRY …
6 MINISTRY OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS (MFA)      MINISTRY <NA>   MFA          MINISTRY …
```


:::
:::
